# cscdm Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "cscdm" {
  api_key   = ""
  api_token = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) CSC Domain Manager API Key
- `api_token` (String, Sensitive) CSC Domain Manager API Token
